Organics:
 
"Yes, he does possess the untold legions.  We fought some Sweeps and their commander earlier.  He has the legions and the ability to create more.  In essence, he has an unlimited supply of Sweeps to guard him." the valkyrie said.

Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
"He's the size of a moon.  You would require untold
legions of bots to protect even all of the obvious
entrances.  And once you're inside the only unknown
would be 'can they get to me faster than I can open
the Matrix', which I think we can lean toward the
answer being no.  Is there something essential I'm
missing?  Or does he just have the aforementioned
'untold legions' at his disposal, in which case we'd
be slag either way."

--- robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
> OOC:  I don't know about you're faction, I'm not on
> the Council.  As for going up to Unicron, it would
> not be very feasible.  They need to blast INTO
> Unicron, FIND Malice, and BLAST out and return to
> the planet safely.  All things they can't really do
> right now.
>  
> IC:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> "Perhaps you would like to show me an opening not
> guarded and a time where he is not defended.  We
> should wait and have him brought to us.  Much
> easier, and besides, they will want to show off
> their newest toy anyway." the clone said, drawing on
> memory and the Matrix.  He replaced the artifact
> back into it's place and his chest closed.
> "Though I might have the raw power to blast in,
> there are too many unknowns to go blindly forward."
> 
> Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
> "If you want to stop Unicron, why don't you just
> take
> the slagging Matrix to him, and open it like Optimus
> Prime did?"  She had no idea why she was suggesting
> that two such sources of Destiny energy wipe each
> other out, but she doubted the Decepticon would have
> simply be oblivious to the option.
> 
> OOC: Has the council begun discussion on the
> Deviner's
> limitations, or is it just a big topic of debate
> 
> --- robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
> > Megatron Revived:
> >  
> > "No, there is no 'divided' Matrix.  Most
> Decepticons
> > and appearently Pedacons assume leadership through
> > force and brutality.  Just as the Autobot Matrix
> > allowed Optimus Prime to give life to the Dinobots
> > and others, the Decepticon Matrix allows me to do
> > the same.  I have spent time working with my
> Matrix,
> > and developed the ability to read any Decepticon's
> > spark."
> > A series of locks unlatched and Megatron Revived
> > pulled the Matrix out.  The gold, ornate housing
> > held inside a pulsating red crystal, the actual
> > Matrix.  The clone held it firmly in his hands, so
> > no one could take it, if they were dumb enough to
> > try.
> > "This is THE Decepticon Matrix of Leadership."
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
> > Windlord:
> > 
> > "Or both has adivided MAtrix"said Windlord 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley
> > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Megatron Revived:
> > >  
> > > The emperor clone stood, and his three part
> chest
> > panel opened.  
> > Another cover opens and reveals the golden Matrix
> > housing.
> > > "No, I have the Matrix.  He must have a very
> > convincing fake."
> > > 
> > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Windlord:
> > > 
> > > "But Hydras has it.... as long as I know"said
> the
> > male
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley
> > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > Megatron Revived:
> > > >  
> > > > "That fool's opinion is meaningless.  I
> possess
> > the one thing 
> > that 
> > > trully denotes leadership.  The Decepticon
> Matrix
> > of Leadership." 
> > > the clone said.
> > > > 
> > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Windlord::
> > > > 
> > > > "The rightful Decepticon's leader????"said
> > Windlord "I would 
> > like 
> > > to 
> > > > hear Hydra's opinion about this"
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
> > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > Megatron Revived:
> > > > >  
> > > > > The white and black robot stood and looked
> at
> > Windlord.
> > > > > "I am Megatron Revived.  The mega computer
> > Vector Sigma cloned 
> > > the 
> > > > spark of the original, and thus I live.  I am
> > the rightful 
> > Leader 
> > > of 
> > > > the Decepticons, but they are all but gone.  I
> > am here to runite 
> > > > with my family."
> > > > > 
> > > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Windlord::
> > > > > 
> > > > > "Megatron???"said toughtful the male "Isn't
> > that the name of 
> > > > > Deceptions and Predacons leaders????"
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
> > > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > Organics:
> > > > > >  
> > > > > > "I heard a distress call, and answere it. 
> > Me and Ydrassil.  
> > > We 
> > > > > have two new guests.  This is Fortuneteller,
> > and that is my 
> > > older 
> > > > > step brother, Megatron." the valkyrie said,
> > pointing to th 
> > > newest 
> > > > > arrivals.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > Windlord:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Windlord loeft the base a flew around when
> > he saw Organics 
> > and 
> > > > > other 
> > > > > > bots there.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > He landed and said.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "Organics??? what are you doing here"said
> > kindly the male
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert
> riley 
> > > > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > OOC:  Malice is currently inside
> Unicron. 
> > Two of the 
> > > Minions 
> > > > > have 
> > > > > > successfully brainwashed him... I think. 
> A
> > tricky one, 
> > > Malice.  
> > > > > > There is a femme currently inside the
> base,
> > named Wolfblade, 
> > > who 
> > > > > has 
> > > > > > great feelings for him.  But her player
> has
> > disappeared 
> > right 
> > > > > now.  
> > > > > > Malice is sparing against the minion
> > Blacknightmare right 
> > now.
> > > > > > >  
> > > > > > > Megatron Revived/ Organics:
> > > > > > >  
> > > > > > > Megatron Revived kneeled down to see
> what
> > exactly 
> > > > Fortuneteller 
> > > > > > was doing.  He tried scanning fo unusual
> > energies, but came 
> > up
